name: platformize-three
description: platformize three to many platform wechat/taobao miniprogram/game

scripts.build:file: concurrently 'swc plugin -d dist-plugin -C module.type=commonjs' 'swc src -d dist'
scripts.build: concurrently 'pnpm run build:type' 'pnpm run build:file' 'cp src/base/decoder_base.wasm dist/base/decoder_base.wasm || exit 0'

author: DeepKolos<deepkolos@qq.com>
